title: Cell Lines
subtitle: Cell Line Proteomics Analysis
description: Deep proteomics analysis of cell line samples to accurately characterize cell signaling, metabolic pathways, and protein expression profiles. Identify 8,000-12,000 proteins with Orbitrap Astral to accelerate cell biology research.

features.title: Broad Cell Line Support
features.description: Consistent and reproducible results from diverse cell lines including mammalian, insect, and yeast cells. Optimized for common lines like HEK293, CHO, and HeLa.

features.title: High Sensitivity Detection
features.description: Capture low-abundance regulatory proteins and transcription factors for a complete picture of cellular signaling networks. Achieve deep coverage from 1-5 million cells.

features.title: Comparative Analysis
features.description: Treatment/control comparisons, time-course studies, and genetic manipulation effects analysis. Support robust statistical analysis with LFQ or TMT quantification.
